name: AssessmentsRelatedToMedicationManagementAssessmentsUsingAssessmentScales
title: Assessments Related to Medication Management, Assessments Using Assessment Scales
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for assessments using assessment scales for patient on medication therapy and typically used by a pharmacist providing medication management services.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Assessment

The intent of this data set is to document when a provider performs an assessment using an assessment scale related to the evaluation of a patient on medication therapy.),(Inclusion Criteria: Assessment using an assessment scale or questionnaire related to care of a patient on medication therapy or those typically performed by a pharmacist.),(Exclusion Criteria: General assessments that are not specific to a particular scale or questionnaire.  Monitoring procedures.  Any evaluation procedures not related to a patient on medication therapy or those intended for diagnosis of a disease or disorder.)
